Authors:
Naozumi Kondo, Hiromu Iwasaki, Toshiyuki Tokiwa, Satoshi
Omura, Kenichi Nonaka
Title:
Two new species of Simplicillium (Cordycipitaceae) from
aquarium foam in Japan
Abstract:
Five Simplicillium isolates were obtained from foam
generated in an aquarium in Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan. Using a combination
of micro-morphological characteristics and multigene (ITS, SSU, LSU,
TEF) phylogenics, the isolates were proved to be two Simplicillium
species which were previously undescribed. The two new species (S.
catenulatum and S. spumae) differ from known Simplicillium species in
the morphology of their conidia and conidiophores.
